籤詩版本二:
Ƙwayoyin ciyayi da ciyayi suna bunƙasa, kuma ruwan sama, dusar ƙanƙara, iska, da sanyi duk abubuwan da za a yi.
Nan gaba za ta zama babban amfani ba zato ba tsammani, kuma shahara za ta zama ginshiƙi.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram shine hoton babban gandun daji na pine da cypresses.
A cikin komai akwai daraja.
解曰: Sa'a a kan hanya. Hidimar cancantar rayuwa tsawon rai. Kwayoyin silkworm na filin sun cika. Iyali suna da wadata.
籤詩故事一:
◇Fan Wenzheng ya yanke shawarar harrow da zana porridge
Fan Zhongyan, sanannen jami'i a daular Song, ya fito daga iyali matalauta tun yana karami, ya yi karatu a gidan sufaye a tsaunin Changbai, yakan dafa poridge da lita biyu na gero kowace rana, bayan ya datse dare, sai ya yanke shi. Da wuka guda hudu, sai ya ci guda biyu safe da maraice, ya yanyanka miyau ya ci.
Ana amfani da wannan don bayyana wanda ba ya tsoron wahala, yayi karatu sosai, kuma a ƙarshe ya zama gwanin amfani mai yawa.
Yanke harrow da zana porridge
聖意: Jiazhai mai son kansa ne, neman arziki, zaman lafiya, kasuwanci, aure, nasara, Liujia, matafiya maza, filayen aminci, tsutsotsi, dabbobi shida, lalacewa, gano mutane, kararraki, ƙaura, asarar dukiya, rashin lafiya, kabarin Anshan, alheri.
古人: Fan Wenzheng ya yanke shawarar yin harrow da zana porridge
